In England, in the seven days to 01 May, there were 12,650 new confirmed cases (22.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 April, there were 13,934 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (1,284 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 May is 3,869,113 (6,873.9 cases per 100,000 population).
